data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Junkiert, Łukasz, Walczak, Marcin (2015): Three new species of the genus Exphora Signoret, 1860 (Hemiptera, Fulgoromorpha, Tropiduchidae) from Madagascar. Zootaxa 3926 (1): 129-136, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3926.1.7
